text:
September 26, 1961
Mr. Elmer a. Sulzer, Director
Radio and Television Communications
Indiana University
Bloomington, Indiana
Dear Bromo:
I*m forwarding Jim lynch1 s article to
Betty McKenzie.
Would you mind if I circulated your
criticism (anonymously) to committee members as a
basis of discussion for our committee meeting? I
think committee members might approach better if
they come from Anon. How about it?
Sincerely,
Prank E. Schooley
Director, University
Broadcasting
FESfb
ccs Betty McKenzie
